ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello I am new
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, well i guess i read more than i post, but i wanted to get this newbie some adivce: dont be afraid to ask for help.  when i first started, i was terrified
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, well i guess i read more than i post, but i
wanted to get this newbie some adivce:
dont be afraid to ask for help. when i first started,
i was terrified to ask any one for buffs or extra
items, but you should. also, dont be afraid to ask
anyone to pl you.
Regards
Charles Clavey
"Sandaris"
--- muaddib_1974 <muaddib1974@...> wrote:
> Hello,
> How is everyone today? I am new to this club and
> to EverQuest. I am
> trying to learn things about EverQuest. Anythnig you
> can tell me will
> help. How can you scream, etc.... My name is David,
> I am 27, live in
> Oklahoma.
> David
>
>
